No one forced him to be Batman, to be the CEO that Wayne Enterprises needs, to adopt Dick Grayson and love him more everyday. entry.title: late dawns and early sunsets
entry.summary:
Author: beyondnic

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,006Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 211

Summary: It's about two hours later when Bruce starts to sneak away, accidentally waking Clark up. The room is silent and dark, a beautiful and peaceful darkness. Outside, Metropolis' night is no different, there's no intergalactic threat, no thugs out on the street, no Superman up on the sky, and no Batman lurking in the shadows either. Clark is too asleep to form a proper thought, so his immediate response to Bruce's escape attempt is to just place a steady hand on Bruce's bare hip, he gets closer and against his hair, he whispers: "Stay." Bruce knows Clark's not expecting him to, after all, he had never stayed before, he always managed to get away and run off to his bittersweet crime-ridden streets. And he knows Clark won't hold him hostage, it's an honest plea, a silent prayer, a vow of stability, a solemn compromise Bruce was unexpectedly willing to take. One word. Whispered. Only for him. "Okay." Or Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne start dating and they try to juggle their secret identities and their personal lives.

entry.title: Batman's Alien Anatomy Data
entry.summary:
Author: BlossomingBitch_15

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,587Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 138

Summary: Bruce knows about Kryptonian Biology. Clark had previously allowed him to research whatever he pleased in the Fortress of Solitude after the two of them had become closer.Krypton had more than two common sexes with differing genitalia. There were no public notes on Clark’s sex, and Bruce hadn’t tried hacking the Fortress’ AI out of respect (Clark didn’t have to welcome him into his most private sanctum after all– also, Bruce doubted he could bypass the advanced AI with such a limited time frame).Bruce waits patiently as a silent pillar of support for Clark to regain his confidence. He knows the man is uncomfortable acknowledging his Alien traits, enjoying being seen as more superhuman.Clark pokes at his pie some more, playing with his food as a stalling tactic.“I’ve reached the third stage of Kryptonian maturity. I didn’t even realize I passed the second stage since it seemed like normal teenager’s puberty– I thought I was just a late bloomer before the Fortress was around to reveal my sex.” Clark explains.Bruce processes this, thinking of the previous information he had gathered from the Fortress Of Solitude.The Third Stage of Kryptonian Maturity?“You’re… fertile?”
